snippet: There is an elegant simplicity about election prediction markets, which bring a combined market wisdom to a constantly changing presidential campaign.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column contends there is an elegant simplicity about election prediction markets like Intrade, which bring a combined market wisdom to a constantly changing presidential campaign; notes as of Oct 5, Intrade said Pres Obama had better than a 68 percent chance of re-election.
lead_paragraph: There is an elegant simplicity about election prediction markets, which bring a combined market wisdom to a constantly changing presidential campaign.

headline.seo: Election Prediction Markets Add Clarity to a Wacky Week
headline.main: Market Clarity When Campaign Feathers Fly
